__TOC__

I work on the Launchpad <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~soyuz|Soyuz team]]</nowiki> and live in the Netherlands. 

My homepage (including a list of things I work on, such as Samba, OpenChange and Bazaar) is at http://samba.org/~jelmer/. My launchpad user id is <nowiki>[[http://launchpad.net/~jelmer|jelmer]]</nowiki>.

I'm applying for <nowiki>[[JelmerVernooij-PerPackageUploaderApplication|Per Package Uploader]]</nowiki>

== Contributions ==

For Ubuntu, I mainly work on packaging various projects I'm upstream for. I usually try to upload to Debian and then wait for syncs or request them. A list of packages I maintain in Debian can be found on my <nowiki>[[http://qa.debian.org/developer.php?login=jelmer|Debian QA page]]</nowiki>. 

The packages I maintain or help maintain are:

During the Ubuntu Open Week for Gutsy, I hosted a session on <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MeetingLogs/openweekgutsy/Bazaar|Bazaar]]</nowiki>.

I attended one day of Ubuntu Down Under in Sydney in 2005. I also attended the UDS-K, UDS-L and UDS-M.
